H0.text: How many seconds are there in an hour. 3200

H1.text: How many seconds are there in an hour. 4000

H2.text: How many seconds are there in an hour. 3500

H3.text: How many seconds are there in an hour. 3600

A4.text: An hour is defined contemporarily as exactly 3,600 seconds (SI).

A5.text: In the modern metric system, one hour is defined as 3,600 atomic seconds.
